name: places/ChIJjQwLuCX2wokRhbe9MorrSfc
adrFormatAddress: 2683 Broadway # 7, New York, NY 10025-4412, USA

editorialSummary.text: Department of the Walgreens chain providing prescription medications & other health-related items.

originalText.text: This place is definitely just, mid. I came here to pick-up a photo order and despite it being over 12 hours since estimated pick-up time, the photo (yes, just one photo) wasn’t ready. Staff were helpful, which is why I’m giving 2-stars instead of one, but they seemed flustered with limited customers present to assist. The place is also kind of gross inside? It’s not very organized & it doesn’t appear to be particularly clean.

text.text: This place is definitely just, mid. I came here to pick-up a photo order and despite it being over 12 hours since estimated pick-up time, the photo (yes, just one photo) wasn’t ready. Staff were helpful, which is why I’m giving 2-stars instead of one, but they seemed flustered with limited customers present to assist. The place is also kind of gross inside? It’s not very organized & it doesn’t appear to be particularly clean.

originalText.text: I really thought a pharmacy couldn't possibly suck.   But they do.  Booked my covid and flu shot online.  Picked a time for this eve.  Roll up.   Queue up.   Oh no shots today.  What?   No shots.  Try again next week.  Great communication.  They suck. Went to another pharmacy.  Boom done.  No online booking nonsense.  And crazy.  They did it.  Grrrrr

text.text: I really thought a pharmacy couldn't possibly suck.   But they do.  Booked my covid and flu shot online.  Picked a time for this eve.  Roll up.   Queue up.   Oh no shots today.  What?   No shots.  Try again next week.  Great communication.  They suck. Went to another pharmacy.  Boom done.  No online booking nonsense.  And crazy.  They did it.  Grrrrr

originalText.text: All of the above is true. Before the Coronavirus pandemic that store like others in the neighborhood was always in stock clean and had good help and plenty of cashiers. At least still the Pharmacy staff here is excellent. Thank you. I pray they never close down again.

originalText.text: Don’t expect your prescription to be ready if the automated phone system says it’s ready. They may not even have it in stock.

text.text: Don’t expect your prescription to be ready if the automated phone system says it’s ready. They may not even have it in stock.

originalText.text: Please beware of the incredibly, ridiculously rude and unprofessional dark skinned female, wearing a light colored beanie, white rosary around her neck, roughly 5'5, slim build, about 150 lbs. Her name was something like "Chilise" or something starting with a "CH" This sorry excuse for a human being needs to be terminated immediately. Refused to answer basic questions, seemed bothered that I asked for a bag, slammed all my items in the bag and literally threw the filled bag into my chest. Please forward this review so that nobody experiences this again and if management is reading this, shame on you for having such low standards and hiring this pathetic piece of garbage.
